description.ko: 비에 젖은 미래 도시를 배경으로 거친 도시의 쇠퇴와 활기찬 디지털 로맨스의 교차점을 담아냈습니다.
description.en: The intersection of gritty urban decay and vibrant digital romance, captured in a rain-slicked future city.

prompt: A low-angle cinematic view of a rain-drenched cyberpunk megacity canyon at night. Saturated #FF00FF and #00FFFF neon reflections ripple in hyper-realistic #1A0033 asphalt puddles. A massive #FF6B35 holographic dragon weaves through rusted metal skyscrapers. 8k, Unreal Engine 5, raytracing. Deep volumetric fog, dramatic light spill from urban structures, and a romantic digital atmosphere focusing on individual rain droplets hitting metallic surfaces.
